bioconda.name: bioconductor-ncigraph
bioconda.summary: Pathways from the NCI Pathways Database

biotools.summary: Provides various methods to load the pathways from the NCI Pathways Database in R graph objects and to re-format them.

bioschemas.name: NCIgraph
bioschemas.summary: Provides various methods to load the pathways from the NCI Pathways Database in R graph objects and to re-format them.
